50 years ago, the #Stonewall uprising lit a spark that helped ignite the #LGBTQ rights movement. We’ve come a long way, but there is still much work to do. The fight for #equality continues! #Stonewall50

The President’s desire to add such a question is just a scare tactic to discourage minority participation in this vital count. https://www.vox.com/2019/6/27/18759621/supreme-court-census-decision-citizenship-question-ruling …
